languages.text: {n}Взгляд старицы мрачнеет.{/n} "Кетца Темер разгневан вторжением духов-из-тьмы, обрушивших на мир дождь из огня и металла. Он требует крови — и кровь насытит землю! По какой бы тропе ни ступили боги, пришедшие все исправить".

traits.locale_text: {n}Взгляд старицы мрачнеет.{/n} "Кетца-аль Хет разгневан вторжением духов-из-тьмы, обрушивших на мир дождь из огня и металла. Он требует крови — и кровь насытит землю! По какой бы тропе не ступили боги, пришедшие все исправить".

languages.text: {n}The elder's gaze darkens.{/n} "Quetza Temer is enraged by the invasion of the spirits-from-the-darkness that have called a rain of fire and metal upon this world. He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! No matter the path chosen by the gods who have come to right the wrong."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд старицы мрачнеет.{/n} "Кетца Темер разгневан вторжением духов-из-тьмы, обрушивших на мир дождь из огня и металла. Он требует крови — и кровь насытит землю! По какой бы тропе ни ступили боги, пришедшие все исправить".

traits.locale_text: {n}The elderly priestess's gaze darkens.{/n} "Quetza Temer is enraged by the invasion of the spirits from the darkness that had called a rain of fire and metal upon this world. He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! Regardless of the path that the gods who came to right the wrong tread."

He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! Regardless of the path that the gods who came to right the wrong tread."

He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! Regardless of the path that the gods who came to right the wrong tread."

He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! Regardless of the path that the gods who came to right the wrong tread."

{n}The elder's gaze darkens.{/n} "Quetza Temer is enraged by the invasion of the spirits-from-the-darkness that have called a rain of fire and metal upon this world. He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! No matter the path chosen by the gods who have come to right the wrong."

{n}The elder's gaze darkens.{/n} "Quetza Temer is enraged by the invasion of the spirits-from-the-darkness that have called a rain of fire and metal upon this world. He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! No matter the path chosen by the gods who have come to right the wrong."

languages.text: {n}La expresión de la anciana se ensombrece.{/n} «Quetza Temer montó en cólera cuando los espíritus de las tinieblas nos invadieron y desataron una lluvia de fuego y metal sobre este mundo. Exige que se derrame sangre; ¡y la sangre habrá de empapar el suelo, sea cual sea el camino escogido por los dioses que han venido para enmendar este agravio!».
languages.original_text: {n}The elder's gaze darkens.{/n} "Quetza Temer is enraged by the invasion of the spirits-from-the-darkness that have called a rain of fire and metal upon this world. He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! No matter the path chosen by the gods who have come to right the wrong."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de la anciana sacerdotisa se ensombrece.{/n} «Quetza Temer montó en cólera cuando los espíritus de las tinieblas nos invadieron y desataron una lluvia de fuego y metal sobre este mundo. Exige que se derrame sangre; ¡y la sangre habrá de empapar el suelo, sea cual sea el camino escogido por los dioses que han venido para enmendar este agravio!».

languages.text: {n}老妇人的目光黯淡下来。{/n}“格扎尔特默被黑暗精魂的入侵激怒了，那些精魂令烈火与金属如暴雨般倾泻在这个世界上。他渴求鲜血，鲜血将拯救这片土地！无论神明准备如何纠正这个错误，我们都愿意接受。”
languages.original_text: {n}The elder's gaze darkens.{/n} "Quetza Temer is enraged by the invasion of the spirits-from-the-darkness that have called a rain of fire and metal upon this world. He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! No matter the path chosen by the gods who have come to right the wrong."

traits.locale_text: {n}老祭司的目光黯淡下来。{/n}“格扎尔特默被黑暗精魂的入侵激怒了，那些精魂令烈火与金属如暴雨般倾泻在这个世界上。他渴求鲜血，鲜血将拯救这片土地！但‘神谕’却没有预言到神明会如何纠正这个错误。”

languages.text: {n}Le regard de l'ancienne s'assombrit.{/n} « L'invasion des esprits des ténèbres, qui ont fait pleuvoir le feu et le métal sur ce monde, a rendu Quetza Temer fou de rage. Il exige du sang ; alors, le sang coulera et abreuvera la terre, quelle que soit la voie qu'emprunteront les dieux venus redresser la situation. »
languages.original_text: {n}The elder's gaze darkens.{/n} "Quetza Temer is enraged by the invasion of the spirits-from-the-darkness that have called a rain of fire and metal upon this world. He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! No matter the path chosen by the gods who have come to right the wrong."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de la vieille prêtresse s'assombrit.{/n} « L'invasion des esprits des ténèbres, qui ont fait pleuvoir le feu et le métal sur ce monde, a rendu Quetza Temer fou de rage. Il veut du sang ; alors, le sang coulera et abreuvera la terre, quelle que soit la voie qu'emprunteront les dieux venus redresser la situation. »

languages.text: {n}老人の視線に影が落ちる。{/n}「ケツァ・テメルは、この世界に火と金属の雨を降らせた闇からの精霊の侵略に激怒しているのです。彼は血を求めている…その血が、土を潤すのです！過ちを正しに来た神々がどのような道を歩もうとも」
languages.original_text: {n}The elder's gaze darkens.{/n} "Quetza Temer is enraged by the invasion of the spirits-from-the-darkness that have called a rain of fire and metal upon this world. He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! No matter the path chosen by the gods who have come to right the wrong."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人の視線に影が落ちる。{/n}「ケツァ・テメルは、この世界に火と金属の雨を降らせた闇からの精霊の侵略に激怒しているのです。彼は血を求めている…その血が、土を潤すのです！過ちを正しに来た神々がどのような道を歩もうとも」

languages.text: {n}Der Blick der Ältesten verfinstert sich.{/n} "Quetza Temer ist erzürnt über die Invasion der Geister-aus-der-Dunkelheit, die einen Regen aus Feuer und Metall über diese Welt gebracht haben. Er fordert Blut — und Blut wird die Erde sättigen! Ganz gleich, welchen Pfad die Götter eingeschlagen sind, die gekommen sind, um aus Unrecht Recht zu machen."
languages.original_text: {n}The elder's gaze darkens.{/n} "Quetza Temer is enraged by the invasion of the spirits-from-the-darkness that have called a rain of fire and metal upon this world. He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! No matter the path chosen by the gods who have come to right the wrong."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Blick der alten Priesterin verdüstert sich.{/n} "Quetza Temer ist erzürnt über die Invasion der Geister aus der Dunkelheit, den Regen aus Feuer und Metall über diese Welt gebracht haben. Er fordert Blut — und Blut wird die Erde sättigen! Ganz gleich, welchen Pfad die Götter einschlagen, die gekommen sind, um aus Unrecht Recht zu machen."

languages.text: {n}İhtiyarın bakışlarını karamsarlık kaplıyor.{/n} "Quetza Temer, bu dünyanın üzerine ateşten ve metalden bir yağmur yağdıran karanlıktan gelen ruhların istilası karşısında öfkeyle doldu. Talep ettiği kandır ve o kan ki toprağı doyuracaktır! Yanlışları düzeltmek için gelen tanrıların seçtikleri yol mühim değil!"
languages.original_text: {n}The elder's gaze darkens.{/n} "Quetza Temer is enraged by the invasion of the spirits-from-the-darkness that have called a rain of fire and metal upon this world. He demands blood — and blood shall sate the soil! No matter the path chosen by the gods who have come to right the wrong."
